# Entry Object field definitions

* entryID
  * 64-bit Integer
  * Generated by the server


* creator:
  * user Object
  * Generated by the server  


* createDate 
  * 64-Bit Integer  
  * Unix timestamp
  * Generated by the server  
    

* dueDate
  * 64-Bit Integer
  * Unix timestamp
  * Chosen by User
  * Optional
    
* title
  * String
  * Chosen by User
  * Can be empty, must not be null
    
* description
  * String
  * Chosen by User
  * Can be empty, must not be null
